title: What is Adware?
description: Learn about adware, and how its creators make money from it.

content.content: Adware is a special type of malware that specializes in the generation of revenue by unwantingly displaying adverts on your screen.

There are three main types of adware. Pay Per Click (PPC), Pay Per View (PPV), and Pay Per Install (PPI). Pay Per Click generates revnue for the developers whenever a user clicks on an advertisement. Pay Per View pays whenever a user simply views the advertisement. Pay Per Install pays whenever a user downloads and installs the advertised software.

choices.content: Holding a user's hard drive hostage until they pay them a ransom
Displaying unwanted ads on a user's screen
Performing DoS attacks against a server

quiz.title: Adware is not dangerous to your computer
